name: Dhak Blend 250g + Channi
description:
Rich Dark Chocolate, Cocoa, and Fruit Jam Notes: This dark roast offers a bold, layered profile with deep dark chocolate and cocoa flavours, complemented by a hint of fruit jam for a unique, indulgent taste. 

Best Enjoyed with Milk: Perfectly balanced and smooth with milk, this coffee creates a full-bodied, creamy cup that’s satisfying and rich. 

Includes a Stainless-Steel Channi: This combo comes with a stainless steel channi (filter), making it easy to brew a smooth, grit-free cup at home—ideal for coffee lovers and as a thoughtful gift option. 

Versatile Brewing Options—Channi-Friendly for Effortless Brewing: The Dhak Blend is recommended for espresso-based drinks as well as manual methods like Moka Pot and French Press. With the channi, you can also enjoy a well-filtered, bold cup quickly and easily. 

Description: Indulge in the rich, bold flavours of our Dhak Blend, where dark chocolate, cocoa, and a touch of fruit jam come together to create a memorable coffee experience. Ideal for espresso and manual brews, this dark roast can also be easily prepared with the channi, delivering a smooth, satisfying cup every time.
